title: One Heck Of A Kitchen For One Heck of A Cook!
description:
Welcome to the Hilltop community! This second floor one bedroom condo in the Summit section of Hilltop is conveniently located in Brookhaven Boro. Bright and  spacious, this unit offers updated luxury vinyl plank flooring throughout the shared living room and dining area with large sliding glass doors leading from the living room to a deck/balcony.  The updated bath features a tiled tub/shower,and granite vanity. The nicely sized bedroom features a  large walk-in closet with plenty of space. Washer and dryer are included in the unit in a hallway closet area and a nicely sized storage closet of the main living area provides even more storage space! Community amenities include swimming pool, tennis courts, playground, and clubhouse. Convenient to downtown Media and West Chester with many fabulous restaurants and bars, shops, and local theater. Easy access to major roads and public transportation to center city Philadelphia. Schedule an appointment to see this lovely rental today!

title: Townhouse w/ ensuites for Rent (4Br 4Bth)
description:
Central AC
3-Floor Townhome
Walking distance to the EL
Few step to community dog park
Large backyard/patio
Requirements: Income close to 3x rent
Proof of income and Move-in funds.
Move-in cost: First, Last months' Rents plus Security Deposit.
4 Bedrooms: 2 main bedrooms on 2nd Floor in their own suites with private bathrooms.
2 additional bedroom that share a full bathroom on the 3rd floor.
1 full bathroom and laundry/mudroom on the 1st floor.
Formerly used as artist residency housing, this property offers 1,638 square feet of space, 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and a large private back patio. This is a property of possibilities. Enter into a front living room that leads into an open kitchen/dining area. Beyond the kitchen is a full bathroom with slate shower, and a laundry area and mud room. A back door leads out to a private fenced patio, perfect for a garden and warm weather entertaining. Toward the front of the house, you'll find a comfortable living room with street facing windows and clerestory windows to the entrance hall. Up to the second floor are 2 carpeted bedrooms, one with ensuite bathroom, and both with nice sized closets. There is a hall bathroom as well. On the third floor are two more bedrooms, one carpeted and one hardwood, as well as a full bathroom. There is also a full basement with good storage space and good mechanicals, including a gas fired air handler and central air. Built in 1909, this home has a lot of charm. Located just two blocks off of Frankford Av-Fishtown Corridor, 2-blocks off the EL, and two blocks from the new Fishtown Community Food Co-op, there are many amenities in walking distance and many more to come (La Columbe, Fiore Shake n Steak, Amalgam Coffee, Seven Swords). This is your rental heaven you don't want to miss!

title: Newly Constructed 2bd/2bth
description:
Welcome home to Pulaski Hill Apartments - a one year old, tastefully designed apartment building. This super convenient Germantown location offers easy access to Septa's Wayne Junction Station and Route 1 in a verdant, tree-lined setting.
Each unit at 4529 Pulaski Avenue features luxury vinyl tile, wood-effect flooring throughout. These unique floors look like hardwood, but are more durable and easy to care for. Additional highlights include recessed lighting, stainless steel appliances, abundant natural light, generously-sized closets and stunning tile baths. Additionally, many units offer galley kitchens with island breakfast bars. Pulaski Hill Apartments has must-have amenities like in-unit washer/dryer, central air/heat, dishwasher, garbage disposal and built-in microwave.
The surrounding Germantown neighborhood is home to nearby green spaces like Fern Hill and Wissahickon Parks. There are many local, independently-owned venues such as Attic Brewing Company, Sister Muhammad's Kitchen, Uncle Bobbie's Coffee and Books, Tipsy Cafe, Deke's BBQ and Sid Booker's Shrimp.
Bike storage available. Renters pay for electricity. Pets under 40lbs are welcome with a 300 deposit, half of which is refundable without any pet damage.

title: Studio Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, Package Room, Gym, Bike Storage
description:
The unfurnished studio apartment home at 713 is available for lease at this moment! This 475 square foot Monet studio apartment home on the 7th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view. The classic kitchen features a gas stove, disposal, and dishwasher. This home also has a classic bathroom and neutral carpet. Move into your new home as early as May 5, 2023!
All utilities, except for cable and internet, are included. You have your choice of cable and/or internet provider.
Our amenities are amazing! This community offers a package room, fitness center, yoga studio, sauna, dog spa, resident lounge, guest suites, and bicycle storage. Lounge 201 includes a pool table, media room, printer/copier, conference room, demonstration kitchen, dining area, and seating areas. Plus, we are renovating our roof deck! There is a 24-hour front door attendant and a 24-hour concierge at the front desk. In this building, there is a laundry room on every floor. Plus, you may do multiple loads of laundry at the same time in our large laundry facility on the third floor. We have an attached parking garage! Please note that this valet parking garage is not managed by this community, so the monthly parking fee is separate.
Nearby grocery stores and food markets are Trader Joe's, Rittenhouse Market, Giant, Spruce Food Market, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Markets, Aldi, Acme, Whole Foods, and Sprouts.
Wondering if this home is still available for rent at the Rittenhouse Claridge? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 713 is still listed under the Monet floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
For an unfurnished home, 2 to 22 month lease terms are available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
We can furnish a home for you over 2 weeks following rental application approval and after the home is made ready. Please note that there is a 3 month lease term minimum for a furnished home. You would pay a furnished rent instead of an unfurnished rent. We can calculate this furnished rent for you based upon your choices of home furnishings.
Welcome home!

title: ♥ ♥ Quiet private suite in charming home:  Wifi and Util. Incl! ♥ ♥
description:
Your own private suite with bathroom and partial kitchenette in artsy Lansdowne with utilities and on-site laundry included. Just a stone’s throw to Philly but in a quiet residential area. Please read CAREFULLY before contacting homeowner:  this is a hybrid between a housemate situation and an apartment.  Emails from people who haven't read it carefully and haven't answered the questions won't be answered:
• All Utilities and Wifi included
• Furnished (Bed, kitchen table and modern upholstered chair are all less than 2 years old: They are not in the pictures...)
• Up to 2 cats allowed. Me-ow! =)
• Media-Elwyn train line (station 6 blocks away): 12 minute train ride to University City!
• Several Bus Lines go through 1 block away
• 3 blocks to Trolley Line @ Congress Ave stop (69th Street --- Media)
• Ample parking right out front with $40/year permit
• Running track and tennis courts 1 block away
• Laundry in basement included
• SMOKE FREE home (only inquiries from NON-smokers, NON-Vape please)
• Just 3-6 block walk to Downtown Lansdowne shopping: Camelia Coffee House, Vinyl Revival record store, Lansdowne Farmer’s Market, Jamey’s House of Music Jazz Club, Kia’s Cake and Coffee Shop, Dollar Store and more
• $830/month includes utilities
• Great fit for Students, Flight attendants or pilots (14 minutes from PHL airport!), people saving to buy a house, someone separated or just starting over… or individual having a hard time finding a place that allows cats.
• Available Jan 15 2023
This space is bigger than the pictures appear and very quiet. Home owner is a quiet professional with cats. Home is kept neat and clean and is a No Drugs, No Loud Parties, No Drama zone.
One limitation: there is not an official kitchen in your private space. There’s a new Full sized fridge, Toaster Oven, Microwave, plug in burner, plug in griddle, some dishes and pots and pans (if needed: appliances can be moved if you have your own). It’s best for no-frills dining and not a good fit for those who like to bake or make elaborate meals. Agreeing to a scheduled time to use the home owner’s kitchen once a week for 2 hours can be discussed to be added to agreement for an additional $25/month.
Entrance involves walking through the home owner’s space and up to your 3rd floor. No private entrance but your third floor is completely private.
Credit and Criminal background check required with application. Application fee $45.
One Year Agreement. Possible shorter 6 or 9 month agreement would be considered with a one time pre-payment for the professional cleaning fee of $150 to prepare for the next housemate.
First month, Last month and security deposit ($600) due to move in: $2260
ONLY if you have read ALL of this and it sounds like a good fit please email to set up a quick phone pre-screen chat and then a showing.
Please answer the following via EMAIL:
1) what date you're looking to move in
2) confirm that you are OK with background check
3) confirm that you're OK with phone interview before showing
4) confirm that you understand the kitchen situation
5) confirm that $2260 to move-in is something you can do
If your email doesn't at least include that info. it will not be answered. Before setting up phone interview I want to know that you have read this completely and are a person who is conscientious and pays attention to detail.
Thanks! Sara

title: Lovely property with 3 Bed and 2 Bath unit in Queen Village
description:
Welcome to 776 S 3rd Street! If you are looking for the perfect location, this property checks all the boxes for you in Queen Village. This property has a very unique floor plan and has tons of character that just works! Enter the condo through a private entrance. Walk inside to a Foyer with exposed brick and a large coat closet. To the left is a cute Sitting Room that can be used as a Dining Room with tons of light and Glass Sliding Doors leading to a private patio. The Kitchen has a Large Pantry, Quartz Counter-tops, Stainless Steel Appliances and Tile Backsplash. There is a cute powder room with exposed brick and marble floors on the floor as well. Walk up the stairway with a Wall of Exposed Brick on your left leads you to a Large 2nd Floor Living Room with Hardwood Floors and Tons of Natural Light. There is also a separate room with hardwood floors and a window can be used as a third bedroom, office or workout room. Walk up a level to a large front bedroom that has tons of natural sunlight with 3 Bay Windows Across, Exposed Brick, Walk in Closet and vanity with sink. There is a full bathroom and a second bedroom with a Juliet Balcony. The basement has tons of space of storage and laundry machines.
The owner will also include the furniture if needed for a small upcharge. Located in the desirable Meredith catchment. Queen Village Mews also has a gorgeous Landscaped Common Courtyard in the rear of the building. Amazing Queen Village location with Mario Lanza Park / dog park nearby and countless great shops and restaurants within easy walking distance.

title: 2.5 bd/2 bath MODERN LUXURY APT
description:
I am looking for a wonderful subletter/lease take-over for my lovely modern apartment in King of Prussia, Pennsylvania!  I have 5 months left on my lease (until June 2023) and I have to relocate for my job, which is an unexpected change!  You would save on paying the deposit and have me chip in for the rent every month!!
King of Prussia is a wonderful area to live in!  I live just off the main strip where there are a ton of restaurants and shopping!  The complex is modern and new, and is managed very well.  I love living here!!  It has amenities galore and it makes living here so convenient!  Secure Package delivery next to the mailroom, coffee/espresso machine in the lobby, many lovely decorated common areas for lounging, cooking, having parties and socializing.  There is a small swimming pool and a well-equipped gym and sauna with secure access.  The garage is easy to access from your apartment, and key fob access allows you to get around.  There are storage units in the basement too!  Optional:  covered parking for $50/mo and pet rent for $45/mo.
The bedrooms both have walk in closets and ensuite bathrooms.  The master has a shower over deep soaking tub, and the second room has a high shower.  There is a bonus room that can be used for a study or storage and extra stuff.  All the appliances are by Whirlpool.  The frigerator is a french door style with ice maker and filtered water dispenser in the door.  The sink in the GIANT kitchen island is a deep stainless steel and has a farmhouse style spigot.  All the lighting has been changed to LED lightbulbs, including the center island pendant lights, which are dimmable.  The front door locks, pendant lighting and thermostat are controllable by your handy wifi-enabled app!
The location of my apartment is one of the best in the building; it is on the corner on a high floor that has unimpeded afternoon sunshine and has views of trees and no neighbors can see inside!
Contact me via email for more details!  Date the apartment is available is negotiable.  Tenant(s) must apply as and be approved by management.
